description: Navigate to Wo Muk Road near Fan Leng Lau Road Playground. Walk straight along Wo Muk Road, keeping the Union Plaza building with the Wellcome store on your left and the tree-lined playground on your right. Continue forward for a short distance to reach the destination near the park.
